resources.string:
Welcome!

ISK for EVE Online allows you to watch your pilot´s wallet at any time.

Tap the pilot icon and select the pod pilots you would like to watch.
Update with activated global sync only.
Update with active WIFI connection only. Data volume may be 1 MByte and more.
